cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a solution to the issue of catastrophic forgetting in neural networks, which is a common problem in the field of machine learning. The proposed method involves controlling the plasticity of the network at the neuron level, which suggests that the paper could be relevant to several sub-categories of computer science. Specifically, cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.CV (Computer Vision), and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are all potential sub-categories that could be relevant to this paper.
